## BaseGraphNode.setInput() method

Connects an input slot to another node's output

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInput(id: number, node: BaseGraphNode, inputId: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The input slot ID to connect


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

node


</td><td>

[BaseGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.basegraphnode.md)


</td><td>

The source node to connect from


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

inputId


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The output slot ID of the source node


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Exceptions

Error if the input slot with the given ID doesn't exist

## Example


```typescript
const addNode = new AddNode();
const constantNode = new ConstantNode(5.0);

// Connect constantNode's output 0 to addNode's input 0
addNode.setInput(0, constantNode, 0);
```
